dict.acceptation: 厉害的，强烈的；敏锐的，敏捷的；锐利的；热心的；

sent.orig: Keen Claws (Ex) : A harvest golem's claws function in all ways as +1 keen daggers.
sent.trans: 锐爪(Ex)：收割傀儡的双爪能力视为+1锐利匕首。

sent.orig: Obviously Bayern were very keen and are very keen-to keep him. We will have to see.
sent.trans: 很明显地，拜仁非常渴望非常渴望留住他，我们不得不观望。

sent.orig: Their keen eyes can penetrate the water to a depth of forty feet.
sent.trans: 他们锐利的眼睛能透过水面看到40英尺的深处。

sent.orig: The jury is keen on justifying the judicial decision on juvenile delinquency in junk markets.
sent.trans: 该陪审团热衷于捍卫那个法庭判决，该判决是关于旧货市场里青少年犯罪的。

sent.orig: I am not at all keen on that sort of work.
sent.trans: 我根本不喜欢那种工作。
